royshil/cut-it-out

Trims video files using audio waveforms

View on index · View in 3D Map

Related repos

  • Trims video and audio files without re-encoding
  • command line tool for cutting video files without re-encoding
  • Trims and edits videos in a browser using ffmpeg.wasm
  • Cuts and filters video clips with realtime effects
  • Frontend for ffmpeg video clipping
  • Video editor in the browser using Next.js and FFmpeg
  • AI tool for auto video clipping and speech-to-text
  • Generates video animations from audio waveforms
  • automatically edits video and audio by analyzing audio loudness and other methods for smart cuts
